page.title: 10INDUSTRY
page.content: Most industry in the area is light. There are three industrial areas in this block. In Melling the main industry is connected with timber, there being three large timber yards in the Waddicar district. There is also the BICC factory which makes cables and wires and other electrical components which are exported all over the world. In Netherton there is Northwest Holst which deals with construction of bridges, roads and motorways. On Maghull's Sefton Trading Estate there are lots of small light industriues which vary from shrimp packing to joinery, plastic packaging and double glazing. Most people travel to work by car or train, only a few work within the area. The work force is mainly highly skilled or professional; only small %age manual.
